Wind & Site, one-click away

Wind farm development is a long and challenging task. At each stage of the process, decisions have to be taken using the best available information. Jo em rebel路lo portfolio has been designed to cost-effectively help you answering some key questions:

At the start of development

Which region should I focus my efforts on?
MAP helps you by a zooming sequence of decisions

Before actually measuring

Where should I install a met. mast?
MAST orientates you for a fraction of the price of a real mast

While measuring

How many, where and which Class should my turbines be?
FARM helps you designing your wind farm and selecting your turbines.

Once measurement are available

How profitable will my wind farm be?
SERIES makes your measurements bankable by long-term extrapolation.

Are you interested? Please, Get started
